statements: DELETE FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP' AND quality_of_service = 'High'
DELETE FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE id = 1 AND source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
DELETE FROM QualityOfService WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND service_type = 'HTTP' AND status = 'Good';
DELETE FROM NetworkDevices WHERE location = 'Server Room';
DELETE FROM QoS_Management WHERE service_type = 'VoIP' AND latency > 100;
DELETE FROM QosPolicies WHERE policy_name = 'High Priority';
